chapter.title: OTRS Test Mechanism
chapter.para: OTRS provides automated tests for core modules.

sect1.title: Creating a Test Routine
sect1.para: The test routines are stored in .t files in /scripts/test. There is a file for each and every OTRS module. For example the file /scripts/test/Calendar.t for the Calendar Module.
A test routine consists of the function call of the function to be tested and the analysis of the return value. Example (/scripts/test/Calendar.t):

sect1.title: True()
sect1.para: This function tests whether the return value of the function 'EventAdd()' in the variable $EventID is valid.

sect1.title: False()
sect1.para: This function tests whether the return value of the function 'EventAdd()' in the variable $EventID is invalid.

sect1.title: Is()
sect1.para: This function tests whether the variables $A and $B are equal.
